meanings.definition: Make a characteristic short, high-pitched sound.
meanings.sent1: The birds were chirping happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the sound of birds chirping outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The chirping of the birds seemed to be their way of saying good morning.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, chirping like a joyful bird.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the crickets at night created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a bird.
meanings.sent1: I love the chirping of sparrows in the park.
meanings.sent2: The chirping of the robin signaled the start of spring.
meanings.sent3: The constant chirping of the parrot was both amusing and annoying.
meanings.sent4: The chirping of the birds in the morning was like a natural orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of the canaries in the pet store was a delightful melody.
